summary: "The Texas Chain Saw Massacre" is a scary movie from 1974 about friends who get attacked by a cannibal family while visiting an old house. It was made with a small budget and unknown actors. The movie is mostly fake, but it's based on a real murderer named Ed Gein. It was very violent, so it had trouble finding a company to release it and was banned in some countries. Despite this, it made a lot of money and became a famous horror movie, inspiring many other scary movies.
title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
